document_data.name: Taver
document_data.deathnotes: or next year; slain by a dragon
document_data.mainbody: '''Taver''' was an [[adventurer]] of the early-to-midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was described as bluff, brawling, and guffawing.
document_data.Activities: He was the leader of a band of seven adventurers known as [[Taver's Talons]], who were known as heroes in [[Buckralam's Starn]].
document_data.Relationships: In the band of adventurers he led, one of his people was the father of a certain [[Immeira]].
document_data.History: Taver's band used to ride across Buckralam's Starn, until around {{yearlink|752}} when all seven members perished in the jaws of a [[dragon]]. Their bones were largely unidentifiable and indistinguishable after their deaths.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Two years after their deaths, the men of the [[Iron Fox]], a bandit, came to town and spread rumors of secret evil deeds committed by Taver's Talons. They convinced people in the Starn that the Talons had been fiends in human form out to corrupt women of passing caravans and spread their dark seed. Other rumors were that the Talons came to scout on behalf of a bandit kingdom further away, called Talontar or Darkride.<!--Do not make articles for Talontar or Darkride.-->
